I hope you know where to find the code! ;)

Are you sure this is the right code? :)

It seems you are very curious and impatient to what’s gonna happen
As I said… trust me as you did 1 year ago on the first birthday I prepared for you.
Funny, I just realised that when I started planning your last birthday, we were still just friends…

Things changed huh?

I remember talking to you that birthday is just a thing, you never really celebrated it
But not for me… I’m a very happy person because 20 years ago you were born.
And I told myself you should have a special birthday, because you are very special.

It is a humble, but very honest gift I have.
Rather than things I decided to give you something to breathe
To see and remember

Are you ready for a little adventure?

Look at the nightstand on your side of the bed.
Open the little door carefully and you will find something I bought for you..
Inside, there’s a little something I wrote and more instructions.

I love you a lot ;*
